brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare muscle recession and myectomy on inferior oblique muscle overactivity.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Overactivity of Inferior Oblique Muscle >= 2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Nystagmus
- History of vertical muscle operation
- Mechanical limitation
- Eye disease
- Paralysis
